meanings.definition: A person who smears or spreads something on a surface.
meanings.sent1: The besmearers painted the fence with bright colors.
meanings.sent2: The besmearers used their hands to spread the paint evenly.
meanings.sent3: The besmearers accidentally got paint on their clothes while working.
meanings.sent4: The besmearers were like artists, creating a masterpiece on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The besmearers left a trail of colors wherever they went.

meanings.definition: Those who cover or coat something with a substance.
meanings.sent1: The besmearers coated the cake with a thick layer of frosting.
meanings.sent2: The besmearers covered the floor with a protective layer of wax.
meanings.sent3: The besmearers playfully covered each other in mud during the festival.
meanings.sent4: The besmearers were like magicians, transforming the plain into the extraordinary.
meanings.sent5: The besmearers made the surface shine with their expert coating skills.
